text_block_list.text: Congratulations, Brian. It was a good run.
Congratulations, Brian. It was a good run.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …You're right. From all the races I've run so far, this may have been my No. 1.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: After all, it was the first time I was able to live my feelings for victory so far
So this 1-in-1 race that you won was that meaningful to you.
So this 1-in-1 race that you won was that meaningful to you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: However, I'm not going to be satisfied with just this. The desire to run still keeps me moving forward.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: There are still opponents who I want to overtakeー My Big-sister's back is waiting for me.
That's right, in Narita Brian's eyes, there is something that shines strongly.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Now, the next race… not yet!
